headline: Bank of America Downgrades Fox (FOX), Slashes Price Target to $45
summary: Fox Corporation (NASDAQ:FOX) is one of the Top 10 Stocks Warren Buffett Would Buy in 2026. On February 25, 2026, Bank of America downgraded its rating on Fox Corporation (NASDAQ:FOX) from Buy to Underperform and cut the price target from $80 to $45. The firm has shifted its stance on the stock after anticipating its […]
